reviews.text: Its awesome &they got good hospitality they a smart &its an awesome place av neva been before

My husband and I just completed a 7 day safari through Celebrity cruise lines.  They partnered with Ranger Safaris LTD. We had a fantastic experience.  Our driver, Mohammed, aka Moody, was very skilled at spotting animals.  He shared his 20+ years of knowledge and experience and told fascinating facts about the animals, their behaviors, habits etc.  We saw 26 different animals ( all those promised in the brochure and others I had never heard of before this trip) and 9 spectacular birds.  It truly was a trip of a lifetime and much credit is given to our guide for making it so memorable.
My only negative comment is that the roads were so rough, it would have been better to have more cushioned seats .  But Moody was an expert driver even under harsh road conditions!
Excellent place to be in

We have just returned from a 7 night safari travelling to Lake Manyara, Serengeti, Nrorongoro and Tarangire. This truly has been the holiday of a lifetime for our teenage family of 5, made even more special by our amazing guide Ahmad. He was extremely knowledgable, fun to be with and went above and beyond to make the whole experience one we will never forget. Thank you so much Ranger Safaris and especially Ahmad. The Smith Family, Norfolk
A good tourist host in Tanzania

I used to eat at the Bay Leaf back in the 80's when I lived in Allentown. It is nice that the Bay Leaf survived the near fall of Allentown. Great prices for food this good esp. at lunch. Menu also changes with what is seasonal. Hidden in plain sight on Hamilton Blvd in downtown Allentown is a great little restaurant worth giving a try. We heard about Bay Leaf from a regular customer who lives in Massachusetts and travels to this area regularly.

My wife and I visited this place as we wanted to try something new. This was our fist visit and probably the last. The food was good, but it is definitely is not worth the money. I paid 25 dollars for a little piece of fish, and few veggies on the plate, my wife got the 28 dollar steak that came with identical veggies and we also got a little plate of rice to share. The staff was friendly but I had to call them as nobody would show any interest, not once did they stop to ask if we needed anything or how our food was. We wanted to get more drinks but nobody offered after our glasses were empty most evening, I wanted to get desert at the end but by the time they came I was just ready for a check, and it was a slow night. Most of the time they spent in the back ding some type of paper work. What killed the whole experience for me was the fact that they left the kitchen door open and I saw them taking someones entree out of a microwave. I could live with spending more money for a small dinner but I at least would expect it to be made fresh not in a microwave.

A gem in Center City Allentown. Very professional wait staff. An American Thai restaurant that has something for everyone. We've been going here for 25 years. Really a great deal for lunch. The snow sea bass entree for dinner is one of the finest dishes you will have anywhere.
Great food and service! Had an awesome veal chop. Highly recommend!
Great food. Nice place to eat, friendly atmosphere. I recommend eating at the Bay Leaf.
It's beautiful, very clean and friendly staff. The food is authentic and traditional. Will always visit once am in Arusha. Splendid to say the least!
The colours and the lights are amazing. Very good place to have a date 😊
Had fun. Great place for meal and hanging out 👌
It's a nice and quiet place for everyone located in the city centre with lots of tourists and locals.
A warm place to be.  But..  I found the service was slow.  Anyway it was just me. But a very nice outlook

We got the sampler deal, which was 16000 Tsh per person which turned out to be a pretty decent deal. We got more food than we could easily eat.

They have a buffet style salad bar which features a variety of middle eastern dishes and sauces in a variety of spice levels. 

We received a variety of meats that included some sausages, some mutton and some chicken. Of this mix the chicken was best, followed by the sausage (a little dry, but good flavor) and the mutton (good flavor but fairly tough). In general the meats in Tanzania are overcooked, but if you see the meat hanging unrefrigerated in open air at the various butcher's shops you'll understand why. They have had a number of anthrax outbreaks in recent years tied to tainted beef.

We also received french fries and a special dessert.

They had cold Pepsi products, but I don't think they had any alcohol. This was in the middle of a shopping district and seemed generally safe. The owner was kind enough to ask if we needed a taxi back since it had gotten dark while we ate.

I got the vegetarian option which was filling and delicious. Some of the best naan, a salad buffet (the lentils were the great!) and a heap of yummy fries. Plus the street market atmosphere was fun and the staff were welcoming and friendly.

It is an amazing place for BBQ, I recommend if you're looking best place to taste chicken-BBQ in Arusha but Morombo BBQ in Arusha would the best option too.
Hopefully the friend of mine I told to a place enjoyed it so so much.
Thank you.

The food was average however i think over time the taste has changed!
Kindly go through the cooking method again and return us back the old taste of Khan BBQ
We are your loyal clients from Dar Es Salaam!
The hospitality extended to us,by the owner as well as his waiter was excellent.
Overall happy service ; happy food!

Enjoyed a barbecue here with friends in the evening. Great chicken, lamb and freshly made bread. It can get smoky so make sure you wear clothes that can handle that. The prices are fair and the servings are generous.

Beautiful hotel with lovely staff. A great place to recover for a few days after your hike and before safari. I wish I could have stayed longer!
Great place but have limited cocktails and there is also an entrance fee, but really good music and nice set up. There is a live music section, karaoke and a dance floor.

Nice place for outdoor chilling!
Cocktails are very well prepared.
